outputs.name: RGBA
outputs.description: Pixel value at the given UV coordinate.

outputs.name: RGB
outputs.description: Pixel value (without alpha) at the given UV coordinate.

outputs.name: R
outputs.description: R channel of the pixel value.

outputs.name: G
outputs.description: G channel of the pixel value.

outputs.name: B
outputs.description: B channel of the pixel value.

outputs.name: A
outputs.description: Alpha channel of the pixel value.
